PM2.5.description: Particulate matter with a diameter of 2.5 micrometers or smaller.

PM10.description: Particulate matter with a diameter of 10 micrometers or smaller.

SO2.description: Sulfur dioxide, a toxic gas with a pungent smell.

NO2.description: Nitrogen dioxide, a toxic gas that is a major air pollutant.

CO.description: Carbon monoxide, a colorless, odorless gas that is toxic to humans.

O3.description: Ozone, a gas that occurs both in the Earth's upper atmosphere and at ground level.

temperature.description: The degree of hotness or coldness measured on a definite scale.

humidity.description: The amount of water vapor in the air.

wind_speed.description: The speed of the wind in a given area.

stazione_di_monitoraggio.description: A location where air quality is measured using various sensors.

sensore_pm2.5.description: A sensor designed to detect and measure PM2.5 in the air.

sensore_umidit√†.description: A sensor used to measure the humidity in the air.

sensore_temperatura.description: A sensor used to measure the temperature of the environment.
